definition: a layer of decorative material (such as gold leaf or wood veneer) applied over a surface, to kill by lying on
details:
noun
- a layer of decorative material (such as gold leaf or wood veneer) applied over a surface
- protective covering consisting, for example, of a layer of boards applied to the studs and joists of a building to strengthen it and serve as a foundation for a weatherproof exterior
= synonyms: overlayer, sheathing
verb
- to kill by lying on
= example: to kill by lying on
= synonyms: overlie
- put something on top of something else
= synonyms: cover
